name: Verify login with email sign-in
precondition:
1. Enable sign-in with email and disable other authentication method
2. Visit login page

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description: 1. Verify contents of a login page
inline.expectedResult:
1. Should be in `/login` URL
2. Should render all elements of the page like inputs for email, password, buttons, footer section, etc.

inline.description: 1. Verify focus on initial page load
1. Click sign in button without entering email/username and password
inline.expectedResult: ​​​​1. Should show correct error message of "Please enter your email or username"

inline.description: 1. Enter a password only and then click sign in button
inline.expectedResult: ​​​​1. Should show correct error message of "Please enter your email or username"

inline.description: 1. Enter a email/username only and then click sign in button
inline.expectedResult: 1. Should show correct error message of "Please enter your password"

inline.description: 1. Enter invalid email/username and password and then click sign in button
inline.expectedResult: 1. Should show correct error message of "Enter a valid email or username and/or password."

inline.description: 1. Enter valid email/username and invalid password, and then click sign in button
inline.expectedResult: 1. Should show correct error message of "Enter a valid email or username and/or password." (without hinting that the username is correct)

inline.description:
1. Enter valid email/username and password, and then click sign in button
2. Click logout after successful login
inline.expectedResult:
1. Should successfully logged in and redirected into the default channel
2. Should successfully logged out and redirected back to login page
